import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react'; import img1 from '../assets/images/img1.png'; import Axios from 'axios'; export default function Details() { const [signalement,Setsignalement] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { Axios.get("http://localhost:4000/signalement/getSignalementById/2").then((response) => { Setsignalement(response.data); console.log(response.data); }); }); return ( <>
